description:
• Support refile!
  • Support log done note and timestamp!
  • Support task status change log!
  • Support indent mode! Just like org-mode's indent mode! Now it looks more clear!
  • Support reminders! SCHEDULED, DEADLINE and active timestamp task can have a notification on it's time! Of course support repeater and warning shitf.
  • Support ongoing notification from which you can take quick task,note and journal!
  • Fixed sync issues!
  • Stability improvement.
